name: structure-bytes
description: A library for more efficient data transfers by separating the structure from the values and storing each as binary data

scripts.wabt: bash -c '[[ -d wabt ]]' || (git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/WebAssembly/wabt && cd wabt && make gcc-release-no-tests)
scripts.wat2wasm: npm run wabt && wabt/bin/wat2wasm lib/sha256.wast -o lib/sha256.wasm && ./wasm2ts.js lib/sha256
scripts.build: npm run wat2wasm && rm -rf dist && tsc
scripts.clientside: (cat client-side/upload.ts | grep -v "(window as any).sb = exports"; echo ';'; cat client-side/download.ts | grep -v "from './common'") > client-side/upload-download.ts && npm run build-client
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && typedoc --out docs --name structure-bytes --readme README.md --listInvalidSymbolLinks *.ts && touch docs/.nojekyll
scripts.test: npm run build && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && node test/main && npm run tslint

author: Caleb Sander
